tool_description: Analyzes Power-On Self-Test codes and boot sequence to identify motherboard and system initialization problems.

motherboard_brand.description: Motherboard manufacturer (ASUS, MSI, Gigabyte, ASRock, Dell, HP, Lenovo, Other)

observed_post_codes.description: List of POST codes observed during boot attempts

boot_attempt_count.description: Number of boot attempts to analyze (1-10)

error_messages: Unsupported motherboard brand: Use ASUS, MSI, Gigabyte, ASRock, Dell, HP, Lenovo, or Other.
Invalid POST codes: Provide valid hexadecimal POST codes (e.g., 0x15, A2, FF).
Invalid boot attempt count: Must be between 1-10 attempts.
usage: Specify motherboard_brand and provide observed_post_codes from your system's POST display or debug card. Set boot_attempt_count if you want to analyze multiple boot cycles.
